text: Hamish Carson (born 1 November 1988) is a middle distance athlete from New Zealand. He represented his country at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the 1500 metres. ==Personal bests== {| class="wikitable" |- !Event !Time !Venue !Date |- |800 m |1:49.15 |Claremont, USA |12 April 2014 |- |1000 m |2:26.92 |Hastings, New Zealand |29 January 2010 |- |1500 m |3:36.25 |Swarthmore, PA, USA |17 May 2016 |- |Mile |3:56.72 |Wanganui, New Zealand |19 January 2016 |- |3000 m |7:49.24 |Rhede, Germany |8 July 2011 |- |5000 m |14:00.73 |Melbourne, Australia |3 March 2012 |- |10000 m |30:10.38 |Melbourne, Australia |26 January 2014 |} ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand male middle-distance runners Category:Olympic athletes of New Zealand Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics
title: Hamish Carson
